title: Performance Long Task Event Data
description: Data payload for the performance.long_task event. Fired when a long task (>50ms) is detected via the Long Tasks API.

duration.description: The duration of the long task in milliseconds. Long tasks are defined as tasks exceeding 50ms.

startTime.description: The time at which the long task started, relative to the page load, in milliseconds.

attribution.description: Attribution information describing what caused the long task.
